functions.tag: {CustomModelData:81,display:{Name:'{"translate":"バナナの皮","color":"#FFFFA1","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(V)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"謎の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"何故こんなところにバナナの皮があるのかは永遠の謎である","color":"#A6A6A6"}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"N","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" 一閃：弐"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"謎",Tier:5},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"忍者",SkillID:230,Name:"一閃",Level:2,Interval:20,Trigger:"手に持って右クリック",Count:8},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-0.7d,Operation:2,UUID:[I;11,0,0,22],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.7d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,31],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.7d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,51],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-0.42d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,61],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:1.2,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
